r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Gestion AJ. The average
  contract duration was 0.52 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.2M. The longest
  contract was 2.35 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $4.2M.
lookup_name: 'GESTION AJ'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '13'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '54%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '20%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2.14'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '961.8K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.52'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.2M'
s425_max_duration: '2.35'
s422_max_contract_value: '4.2M'
---
